original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṁ tahaṁ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātam bhuñjanti pe
sa padānam piṇḍapātam bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca tahaṁ tahaṁ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātam bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
